25 namespace voxblox {

33 template <size_t unmasked_bits, typename StoredElement, typename IndexType,
34  typename IndexTypeHasher>
35 class ApproxHashArray {
36  public:
37  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
38 
39  StoredElement& get(const size_t& hash) {
40  return pseudo_map_[hash & bit_mask_];
41  }
42 
43  StoredElement& get(const IndexType& index, size_t* hash) {
44  DCHECK(hash);
45  *hash = hasher_(index);
46  return get(*hash);
47  }
48 
49  StoredElement& get(const IndexType& index) {
50  size_t hash = hasher_(index);
51  return get(hash);
52  }
53 
54  private:
55  static constexpr size_t pseudo_map_size_ = (1 << unmasked_bits);
56  static constexpr size_t bit_mask_ = (1 << unmasked_bits) - 1;
57 
58  std::array<StoredElement, pseudo_map_size_> pseudo_map_;
59  IndexTypeHasher hasher_;
60 };
61 
74 template <size_t unmasked_bits, size_t full_reset_threshold, typename IndexType,
75  typename IndexTypeHasher>
76 class ApproxHashSet {
77  public:
78  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
79 
80  ApproxHashSet() : offset_(0), pseudo_set_(pseudo_set_size_) {
81  for (std::atomic<size_t>& value : pseudo_set_) {
82  value.store(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
83  }
84  // The array used for storing values is initialized with zeros. However, the
85  // zeroth bin can actually store the 0 hash. Because of this to prevent a
86  // false positive on looking up a 0 hash this bin needs to initially store a
87  // different value.
88  pseudo_set_[offset_].store(std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max());
89  }
90 
97  inline bool isHashCurrentlyPresent(const size_t& hash) {
98  const size_t array_index = (hash & bit_mask_) + offset_;
99 
100  return (pseudo_set_[array_index].load(std::memory_order_relaxed) == hash);
101  }
102 
103  inline bool isHashCurrentlyPresent(const IndexType& index, size_t* hash) {
104  DCHECK(hash);
105  *hash = hasher_(index);
106  return isHashCurrentlyPresent(*hash);
107  }
108 
109  inline bool isHashCurrentlyPresent(const IndexType& index) {
110  size_t hash = hasher_(index);
111  return isHashCurrentlyPresent(hash);
112  }
125  inline bool replaceHash(const size_t& hash) {
126  const size_t array_index = (hash & bit_mask_) + offset_;
127 
128  if (pseudo_set_[array_index].load(std::memory_order_relaxed) == hash) {
129  return false;
130  } else {
131  pseudo_set_[array_index].store(hash, std::memory_order_relaxed);
132  return true;
133  }
134  }
135 
136  inline bool replaceHash(const IndexType& index, size_t* hash) {
137  DCHECK(hash);
138  *hash = hasher_(index);
139  return replaceHash(*hash);
140  }
141 
142  inline bool replaceHash(const IndexType& index) {
143  const size_t hash = hasher_(index);
144  return replaceHash(hash);
145  }
146 
155  void resetApproxSet() {
156  if (++offset_ >= full_reset_threshold) {
157  for (std::atomic<size_t>& value : pseudo_set_) {
158  value.store(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
159  }
160  offset_ = 0;
161 
162  // The array used for storing values is initialized with zeros. However,
163  // the zeroth bin can actually store the 0 hash. Because of this to
164  // prevent a false positive on looking up a 0 hash this bin needs to
165  // initially store a different value.
166  pseudo_set_[offset_].store(std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max());
167  }
168  }
169 
170  private:
171  static constexpr size_t pseudo_set_size_ =
172  (1 << unmasked_bits) + full_reset_threshold;
173  static constexpr size_t bit_mask_ = (1 << unmasked_bits) - 1;
174 
175  size_t offset_;
176  std::vector<std::atomic<size_t>> pseudo_set_;
177 
178  IndexTypeHasher hasher_;
179 };
180 } // namespace voxblox
181
